articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Everyone's saying Australia are clear favourites. But…': Shastri on WTC Final - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ravi Shastri spoke in detail about the upcoming World Test Championship final, that takes place between June 7-11 between India and Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India will be aiming to end an almost 10-year wait for an ICC trophy later this month, when the side takes part in the final of the World Test Championship against Australia. The side had last w… [+1831 chars]
